title: Telecom Subscription
description: Collects all generic details related to a customer's telecom subscription plan, including pricing, packages, and individual product subscriptions.

subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
subscriptionDetails.description: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.

equipmentFees.title: Equipment Fees
equipmentFees.description: Captures any equipment fees for items such as routers, modems, recievers, etc.

equipmentInsurance.title: Equipment Insurance
equipmentInsurance.description: Tracks if a customer has opted-in to equipment insurance for the subscription.

responsiblePartyID.title: Responsible Party ID
responsiblePartyID.description: Identifier for the person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.

bundleName.title: Bundle Name
bundleName.description: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + Media'.

internetSubscriptionDetails.description: Internet subscription plan details such as data cap, connection type, and speed details.

landlineSubscriptionDetails.description: Landline subscription plan details including selected features, minutes, and dialing plans.

mediaSubscriptionDetails.description: media subscription plan details including number of channels & included streaming services.

mobileSubscriptionDetails.description: Mobile plan details including number of lines, data rates, cost, etc.
